thread.section_title: Vital Choice Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vital Choice | vitalchoice.com
thread.title: Karen

author: Karen
title: Karen
text: I ordered and paid for 5 pounds of salmon (different sizes) I got (in short order and perfectly cold) Cod...I called customer service...I had barely described what had happened when I was told that they were sending out the Salmon and it was FREE. The salmon also arrived quickly and perfectly frozen and for not a penny more- I am now a life long fan!!! Oh by the way the dark chocolate with Blueberries is wonderful too!
